title: Uncanny X-Men by Chris Claremont (Minutemen-Syl3ntBob)
description:
Includes:

* Issues #94-153
* Giant-Size X-Men #1
__

The very best part of Claremont's defining run, it collects such ground-breaking stories as "The Dark Phoenix Saga" and "Days of Future Past", alongside some lesser know gems like Proteus' saga and I, Magneto.

These are the true high-quality rips, done by Syl3ntBob. Some later issues have also been uploaded but you'd do best to stick with these ones; at a certain point the X-Men title began reading too much like a soap opera...

Anyway, use YACReader to open these because it's awesome. 
Do consider seeding...:)
